text: (nabiye! ovunta) oba mese kiyanu: “mage janataveni! oba obage situ mate (obage) karanavan karamin sitinu. niyata vasayenma mamada (mage situ matayata mage) karanavan karamin sitinnemi. melova avasanaya ka hata paksakgrahiva ætteda yanna pasuva oba dænagannehuya. niyata vasayenma aparadhakaruvan jayagrahanaya karanu nolabannaha”
